page.title: 19NOTTINGHAM OLD MARKET SQUARE
page.content: The Market Square has an interesting history.It's called the Market Square because a market used to be held there.Old women use the square as a chatting place and from time to time,when our teams win the F.A.Cup or our famous skating stars Torvill and Dean come home,celebrations are held there.The Queen sometimes comes there and takes a look round the Council House, signing the visitor's book in the Lord Mayor's Parlour.The fountains outside the Council House make it stand out and make the square more pleasant.Pigeons go and perch there for the day and people bring bread for them to eat.They leave an unpleasant mess for us to clean up.The Council are talking about spending money to make the square look better.
